name: Opening or relocating automatic teller machine or support facility
text:
§412:3-506    A Hawaii financial institution which opens or relocates an automatic teller machine or support facility shall within thirty days thereafter submit a letter to the commissioner containing the following information:



	(1)	The location of the automatic teller machine or support facility;
	(2)	A description of the type of functions which the automatic teller machine or support facility will perform; and
	(3)	The date or anticipated date of opening or relocation. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
